General.Name: GIIB Holdings Bhd
General.Description: GIIB Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the rubber business in Malaysia, Oceania, Africa, North America, and Rest of Asia. It operates through Rubber Compounds, Property Development, Re-Treading Services, Trading, and Others segments. The company engages in manufacturing of rubber compounds; and retreading of tires for motor vehicles and earthmovers, as well as trading of tires related products. It is also involved in the property development and construction activities; and retail and wholesale of natural rubber and the related goods. It offers its products under the Supercool, ToughTread, and Rübtek brands. The company was formerly known as Goodway Integrated Industries Berhad and changed its name to GIIB Holdings Berhad in December 2020. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Nilai, Malaysia.
